		<wp:postmeta>

		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>_menu_item_xfn</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>_menu_item_url</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[http://pixwind.com/]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
	</item>

		<wp:post_id>103</wp:post_id>

		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>_wp_attachment_metadata</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[a:5:{s:5:"width";i:480;s:6:"height";i:320;s:4:"file";s:17:"2014/08/hh_09.jpg";s:5:"sizes";a:2:{s:9:"thumbnail";a:4:{s:4:"file";s:17:"hh_09-150x150.jpg";s:5:"width";i:150;s:6:"height";i:150;s:9:"mime-type";s:10:"image/jpeg";}s:6:"medium";a:4:{s:4:"file";s:17:"hh_09-300x200.jpg";s:5:"width";i:300;s:6:"height";i:200;s:9:"mime-type";s:10:"image/jpeg";}}s:10:"image_meta";a:10:{s:8:"aperture";i:0;s:6:"credit";s:0:"";s:6:"camera";s:0:"";s:7:"caption";s:0:"";s:17:"created_timestamp";i:0;s:9:"copyright";s:0:"";s:12:"focal_length";i:0;s:3:"iso";i:0;s:13:"shutter_speed";i:0;s:5:"title";s:0:"";}}]]></wp:meta_value>

	</item>

	<item>
				<title>再瘦一弯</title>
		<link>http://pixwind.com/1.html</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 10 Sep 2000 02:11:33 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[terry]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://pixwind.com/?p=1</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<p style="text-align: left;">此刻
你是那么圆满
而我却
想你想成瘦月一弯
没有你暗夜便是孤单
只因流浪与辗转
生命多了流连忘返</p>
<p style="text-align: left;">让风听见
让夜看见
给予便是坦然
为了你的圆满
我愿再瘦一弯</p>
<span style="color: #999999;"><em>——2000年中秋节</em></span>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>1</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2000-09-10 10:11:33</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2000-09-10 02:11:33</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>hello-world</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<category domain="post_tag" nicename="%e4%b8%ad%e7%a7%8b%e8%8a%82"><![CDATA[中秋节]]></category>
		<category domain="post_tag" nicename="%e6%9c%88%e4%ba%ae"><![CDATA[月亮]]></category>
		<category domain="category" nicename="wind"><![CDATA[有风吹过]]></category>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>_edit_last</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:comment>
			<wp:comment_id>1</wp:comment_id>
			<wp:comment_author><![CDATA[WordPress先生]]></wp:comment_author>

	</item>
	<item>
				<title>示例页面</title>
		<link>http://pixwind.com/sample-page</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 09 Aug 2014 08:11:33 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[terry]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://pixwind.com/?page_id=2</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[这是示范页面。页面和博客文章不同，它的位置是固定的，通常会在站点导航栏显示。很多用户都创建一个“关于”页面，向访客介绍自己。例如，个人博客通常有类似这样的介绍：

<blockquote>欢迎！我白天是个邮递员，晚上就是个有抱负的演员。这是我的博客。我住在天朝的帝都，有条叫做杰克的狗。</blockquote>

……公司博客可以这样写：

<blockquote>XYZ Doohickey公司成立于1971年，自从建立以来，我们一直向社会贡献着优秀doohicky。我们的公司总部位于天朝魔都，有着超过两千名员工，对魔都政府税收有着巨大贡献。</blockquote>

您可以访问<a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-admin/">仪表盘</a>，删除本页面，然后添加您自己的内容。祝您使用愉快！]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>2</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2014-08-09 08:11:33</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2014-08-09 08:11:33</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>sample-page</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>page</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>_wp_page_template</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[default]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
	</item>

		</wp:postmeta>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>_menu_item_url</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
	</item>

	<item>
				<title>霓虹香岸秦淮河</title>
		<link>http://pixwind.com/12.html</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 04 Jul 2010 08:38:15 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[terry]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://pixwind.com/?p=12</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/qinhuaihe1.jpg"><img class="alignnone wp-image-27 size-full" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/qinhuaihe1.jpg" alt="qinhuaihe1" width="800" height="533" /></a><!--more-->没有“商女”唱“后庭花”，只有游人穿梭喧嚣。哥呢，只是慕名而来拍夜景的。
<span style="color: #999999;">(光圈F20，快门速度30s，ISO200，三脚架)</span>

<a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/qinhuaihe6.jpg"><img class="alignnone wp-image-28 size-full" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/qinhuaihe6.jpg" alt="qinhuaihe6" width="800" height="533" /></a> <a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/qinhuaihe2.jpg"><img class="alignnone wp-image-29 size-full" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/qinhuaihe2.jpg" alt="qinhuaihe2" width="533" height="800" /></a>]]></content:encoded>

				<title>甜杏色爱</title>
		<link>http://pixwind.com/16.html</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 29 Jun 2008 02:56:15 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[terry]]></dc:creator>

		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/xing_600_01.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-42" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/xing_600_01.jpg" alt="xing_600_01" width="600" height="389" /></a>

买了几颗杏，觉得色彩不错，都不舍得吃掉，下肚之前拍两张纪念一下。
<!--more--><a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/xing_600_02.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-43" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/xing_600_02.jpg" alt="xing_600_02" width="600" height="389" /></a>]]></content:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>火车碾过的视觉</title>
		<link>http://pixwind.com/18.html</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 10 Feb 2008 15:19:26 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[terry]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://pixwind.com/?p=18</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/train_vision_02.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-51" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/train_vision_02.jpg" alt="train_vision_02" width="480" height="360" /></a>
这组照片拍于春节前回家的火车上。天刚亮，火车离开大同站不久，一路向西。

<!--more--><a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/train_vision_03.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-50" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/train_vision_03.jpg" alt="train_vision_03" width="480" height="360" /></a>
这一张让我联想起在漫漫大洋中航行的泰坦尼克号。

<a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/railway_vision_02.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-53" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/railway_vision_02.jpg" alt="railway_vision_02" width="480" height="360" /></a> <a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/railway_vision_15.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-54" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/railway_vision_15.jpg" alt="railway_vision_15" width="480" height="360" /></a> <a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/railway_vision_17.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-55" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/railway_vision_17.jpg" alt="railway_vision_17" width="480" height="360" /></a> <a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/railway_vision_18.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-56" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/railway_vision_18.jpg" alt="railway_vision_18" width="480" height="360" /></a>

家乡府谷县城。]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>蓝皮肤</title>
		<link>http://pixwind.com/63.html</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 12 Nov 2004 16:42:54 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[terry]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://pixwind.com/?p=63</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[睡梦中
有人召唤我一起去旅行
懵懂的我
早已习惯站在时光的畔上
打捞远方的风景
天空的皮肤是蓝色的
我的目光却执着地想要穿透它
直到被染成天空的颜色
我收起最后一片思念
放入贴身的衣袋
然后对自己说
走
去旅行

<em><span style="color: #999999;">——2004年11月</span></em>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>63</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2004-11-13 00:42:54</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2004-11-12 16:42:54</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>%e8%93%9d%e7%9a%ae%e8%82%a4</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<category domain="post_tag" nicename="%e6%97%85%e8%a1%8c"><![CDATA[旅行]]></category>

	<item>
				<title>冬眠</title>
		<link>http://pixwind.com/65.html</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 09 Nov 2010 02:24:59 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[terry]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://pixwind.com/?p=65</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[阳光温暖
浮云依旧
风却很给力
我刚刚做了一个艰难的决定
冬眠

先在地上挖个坑
再铺上厚厚的落叶
我要躺在这温暖的洞穴里
暂别城市的喧嚣
好好睡上一觉

也许我会睡很久
但请别打扰
我要等
春风吹起的某个早晨
温暖花开的声音
将我吵醒]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>65</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2010-11-09 10:24:59</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2010-11-09 02:24:59</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>%e5%86%ac%e7%9c%a0</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<category domain="post_tag" nicename="%e5%86%ac%e7%9c%a0"><![CDATA[冬眠]]></category>
		<category domain="category" nicename="wind"><![CDATA[有风吹过]]></category>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>_edit_last</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
	</item>
	<item>
				<title>家乡，黄土高原雪景</title>
		<link>http://pixwind.com/67.html</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 21 Feb 2007 16:51:20 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[terry]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://pixwind.com/?p=67</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/eye78207082112341337.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-72" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/eye78207082112341337.jpg" alt="eye78207082112341337" width="600" height="450" /></a>

我的老家在陕北黄土高原，每年入冬的第一场雪要到第二年初春才能彻底融化。这一组照片是春节回家时拍的。高原的冬天竟是如此温厚唯美，与生机盎然……

<!--more--><a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/eye29202082112341347.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-71" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/eye29202082112341347.jpg" alt="eye29202082112341347" width="600" height="450" /></a>

<a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/eye26201082112341157.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-70" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/eye26201082112341157.jpg" alt="eye26201082112341157" width="600" height="450" /></a> <a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/eye8520608211234567.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-69" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/eye8520608211234567.jpg" alt="eye8520608211234567" width="600" height="450" /></a> <a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/eye42201082112341126.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-68" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/eye42201082112341126.jpg" alt="eye42201082112341126" width="600" height="450" /></a>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>67</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2007-02-22 00:51:20</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2007-02-21 16:51:20</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>%e9%bb%84%e5%9c%9f%e9%ab%98%e5%8e%9f%e9%9b%aa%e6%99%af</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>
		<wp:menu_order>0</wp:menu_order>
		<wp:post_type>post</wp:post_type>
		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>
		<wp:is_sticky>0</wp:is_sticky>
		<category domain="post_tag" nicename="%e5%ae%b6%e4%b9%a1"><![CDATA[家乡]]></category>
		<category domain="category" nicename="wind"><![CDATA[有风吹过]]></category>
		<category domain="post_tag" nicename="%e9%9b%aa%e6%99%af"><![CDATA[雪景]]></category>
		<category domain="post_tag" nicename="%e9%bb%84%e5%9c%9f%e9%ab%98%e5%8e%9f"><![CDATA[黄土高原]]></category>
		<wp:postmeta>
			<wp:meta_key>_edit_last</wp:meta_key>
			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
	</item>
	<item>
				<title>理想的堡垒 </title>
		<link>http://pixwind.com/76.html</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 19 Jul 2011 15:16:42 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[terry]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://pixwind.com/?p=76</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[人们都躲在
所谓理想筑起的堡垒里
只留几个小孔
向外窥望

为了传说中的爱情
我挣脱自己的堡垒
对准了一个目标
发起了一次次冲锋
无奈堡垒太坚固
我退了回来

最后
我用所剩无几的真诚
捆绑了一个结实炸药包
压了上去

一阵硝烟散去
那堡垒
依然坚固
而我
却被炸得粉碎

人们像往常一样
加固着自己的堡垒
我掩埋好上一个我的尸体
在暗夜里
继续
匍匐前行

<span style="color: #999999;"><em>2011.7.19</em></span>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	</item>
	<item>
				<title>外滩之美</title>
		<link>http://pixwind.com/88.html</link>
		<pubDate>Thu, 26 Aug 2010 15:48:07 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[terry]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://pixwind.com/?p=88</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/外滩之美.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-89" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/外滩之美.jpg" alt="外滩之美" width="800" height="533" /></a>

去上海出差数日，忙里偷闲，和两个喜欢摄影的朋友去拍外滩，话不多说，上图。

<!--more--><a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/waitan_2_03.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-90" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/waitan_2_03.jpg" alt="waitan_2_03" width="480" height="320" /></a> <a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/waitan_3_10.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-91" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/waitan_3_10.jpg" alt="waitan_3_10" width="480" height="320" /></a> <a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/waitan_3_05.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-92" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/waitan_3_05.jpg" alt="waitan_3_05" width="480" height="320" /></a> <a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/waitan_3_09.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-93" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/waitan_3_09.jpg" alt="waitan_3_09" width="480" height="320" /></a>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>88</wp:post_id>

	</item>
	<item>
				<title>朱家角</title>
		<link>http://pixwind.com/95.html</link>
		<pubDate>Wed, 15 Sep 2010 15:49:34 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[terry]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://pixwind.com/?p=95</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/zhujiajiao.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-97" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/zhujiajiao.jpg" alt="zhujiajiao" width="600" height="903" /></a>

“苍苍九峰北麓，茫茫淀山湖之滨”，朱家角镇位于上海市青浦区中南部，紧靠淀山湖风景区。从市区出发时下着小雨，在人民广场乘车前往朱家角镇，车程一小时，中午时分到达。细雨下会儿停会儿，但并不影响大家游玩的心情。我撑伞边逛边拍，细雨中逛古镇，蛮有味道，只是没有佳人作伴。

<!--more-->

<a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/09/zhujiajiao_031.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-99" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/09/zhujiajiao_031.jpg" alt="zhujiajiao_03" width="480" height="320" /></a> <a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/09/zhujiajiao_071.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-100" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/09/zhujiajiao_071.jpg" alt="zhujiajiao_07" width="480" height="720" /></a> <a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/09/zhujiajiao_131.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-101" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/09/zhujiajiao_131.jpg" alt="zhujiajiao_13" width="480" height="720" /></a> <a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/09/zhujiajiao_141.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-102" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/09/zhujiajiao_141.jpg" alt="zhujiajiao_14" width="480" height="320" /></a> <a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/09/zhujiajiao_201.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-103" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/09/zhujiajiao_201.jpg" alt="zhujiajiao_20" width="480" height="320" /></a>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>是得靠点谱</title>
		<link>http://pixwind.com/105.html</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 13 Sep 2010 15:58:21 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[terry]]></dc:creator>

于上海1933老场坊，是得靠点谱了！]]></content:encoded>

	</item>
	<item>
				<title>冬季成都，柔软时光</title>
		<link>http://pixwind.com/108.html</link>
		<pubDate>Mon, 04 Jan 2010 16:01:27 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[terry]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://pixwind.com/?p=108</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/chengdu_07.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-112" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/chengdu_07.jpg" alt="chengdu_07" width="480" height="640" /></a>

来成都出差已半月，成都向来以慢著称，然而工作节奏依然慢不下来，因为本地的客户一点不急，着急的是我们。难得某天出来逛逛，宽窄巷子，锦里，茶楼，美味小吃，精美的手工艺品，还有静静流淌的府南河……只有放慢脚步，才能享受到这个城市特有的柔软时光。<!--more-->

&nbsp;

<a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/chengdu_08.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-111" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/chengdu_08.jpg" alt="chengdu_08" width="480" height="360" /></a> <a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/chengdu_11.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-110" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/chengdu_11.jpg" alt="chengdu_11" width="480" height="360" /></a> <a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/chengdu_02.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-113" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/chengdu_02.jpg" alt="chengdu_02" width="480" height="640" /></a><a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/chengdu_17.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-109" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/chengdu_17.jpg" alt="chengdu_17" width="480" height="640" /></a>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>108</wp:post_id>
		<wp:post_date>2010-01-05 00:01:27</wp:post_date>
		<wp:post_date_gmt>2010-01-04 16:01:27</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>

		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>

		<category domain="category" nicename="pix"><![CDATA[时光缩略图]]></category>

			<wp:meta_value><![CDATA[1]]></wp:meta_value>
		</wp:postmeta>
	</item>
	<item>
				<title>北京冬之末</title>
		<link>http://pixwind.com/116.html</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 14 Mar 2010 16:10:18 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[terry]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://pixwind.com/?p=116</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/hh_01.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-120" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/hh_01.jpg" alt="hh_01" width="480" height="320" /></a>

某人游走在冬天的末梢，狗日的春天却打死也不来。<!--more-->

&nbsp;

<a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/hh_07.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-119" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/hh_07.jpg" alt="hh_07" width="480" height="720" /></a> <a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/hh_09.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-118" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/hh_09.jpg" alt="hh_09" width="480" height="320" /></a> <a href="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/hh_11.jpg"><img class="alignnone size-full wp-image-117" src="http://pixwind.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/08/hh_11.jpg" alt="hh_11" width="480" height="320" /></a>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>早安</title>
		<link>http://pixwind.com/79.html</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 20 Aug 2011 22:31:51 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[terry]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://pixwind.com/?p=79</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[睡眼惺忪
微凉的清晨
我在宽松的高速路驾车飞奔
傍晚我喜欢追着落日
早晨我喜欢迎着朝阳
道路总没有尽头
短暂停留只是为了更远的行程
车轮总亲吻着路面
无论道路多遥远
所以它们是幸福的

早安
在路上的人们

<em><span style="color: #999999;">2011.8.21</span></em>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>
		<wp:post_id>79</wp:post_id>

		<wp:post_date_gmt>2011-08-20 22:31:51</wp:post_date_gmt>
		<wp:comment_status>open</wp:comment_status>
		<wp:ping_status>open</wp:ping_status>
		<wp:post_name>%e6%97%a9%e5%ae%89</wp:post_name>
		<wp:status>publish</wp:status>
		<wp:post_parent>0</wp:post_parent>

		<wp:post_password></wp:post_password>

	<item>
				<title>晚安</title>
		<link>http://pixwind.com/81.html</link>
		<pubDate>Sun, 21 Aug 2011 15:29:31 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[terry]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://pixwind.com/?p=81</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<span style="color: #444444;">你出现</span><br style="color: #444444;" /><span style="color: #444444;">像夏夜的风</span><br style="color: #444444;" /><span style="color: #444444;">有风的日子里</span><br style="color: #444444;" /><span style="color: #444444;">我总是酣然入梦</span><br style="color: #444444;" /><br style="color: #444444;" /><span style="color: #444444;">夏末秋凉</span><br style="color: #444444;" /><span style="color: #444444;">这酣然将继续</span><br style="color: #444444;" /><span style="color: #444444;">等秋叶落下时分</span><br style="color: #444444;" /><span style="color: #444444;">每一片都将是梦的层垫</span><br style="color: #444444;" /><span style="color: #444444;">在落雪冰封的冬季</span><br style="color: #444444;" /><span style="color: #444444;">我将枕着它们</span><br style="color: #444444;" /><span style="color: #444444;">继续冬眠</span><br style="color: #444444;" /><br style="color: #444444;" /><span style="color: #444444;">晚安</span><br style="color: #444444;" /><span style="color: #444444;">明天又是崭新的么</span><br style="color: #444444;" /><br style="color: #444444;" /><em><span style="color: #999999;">2011.8.21</span></em>]]></content:encoded>
		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[]]></excerpt:encoded>

	<item>
				<title>鸟人的理想</title>
		<link>http://pixwind.com/83.html</link>
		<pubDate>Tue, 25 Feb 2014 03:26:17 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[terry]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://pixwind.com/?p=83</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[堵车
让城市成为没有润滑的世界
地铁
像沙丁鱼罐头
于是
我曾想变为一枚鸟人
滑翔在城市的上空
现在
即使我成为鸟人
也怕霾呀

<span style="color: #999999;"><em>2014-2-25</em></span>]]></content:encoded>
